document.full_text: the death of a bexar county sheriff's sergeant who died in a hail of gunfire as he sat in his patrol car is being investigated for a possible connection to mexico's drug cartels, county officials said on tuesday.
document.title: mexican drug link probed in ambush murder of texas lawman
lines_and_colors: the death of a bexar county sheriff's sergeant who died in a hail of gunfire as he sat in his patrol car is being investigated for a possible connection to mexico's drug cartels, county officials said on tuesday.
